channel.title: Home of Geoffrey Liu on PS70: Intro to Digital Fabrication
channel.description: Recent content in Home of Geoffrey Liu on PS70: Intro to Digital Fabrication

item.title: Week 2: 2D Design & Cutting
item.description: I was on the waitlist for the class and joined 1.5 weeks late so my documentation starts on Week 2 :). This week, I worked on: developing the website to document my progress throughout the course Working on 2D design and laser printing using Fusion360 Thinking about final project ideas Website creation I have pretty much no experience in front-end web development, most of my skills are in backend development and database stuff.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Geoffrey. I still need to update this about me page.
